metadata.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react to approaching the diagrams in the classroom. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to 1359; -1; -757see the AD play

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Is that what a mind flayer looks like on the inside? As if the outside wasn't disturbing enough.
0.context: NodeContext: Karlach with an air of delight, like a kid looking at guts.
